articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: F1 Canadian GP FP2 extended in wake of CCTV issue - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Formula 1 chiefs have extended second practice for the Canadian Grand Prix after CCTV problems triggered a lengthy red-flag delay and early end to the opening session.
articles.content:
Running in FP1 had originally been stopped after Alpine's Pierre Gasly came to a halt on the long run between Turns 7 and 8 due to a driveshaft issue.
Once his car was pushed behind the barriers as … [+1572 chars]
